long_description: Keep a sharp eye on the line, whether it's over deep ruts, stones, roots, or ravines with the adaptable Julbo Dirt photochromic sunglasses that can be worn in a wide variety of light conditions. Zebra(R) photochromic NXT lenses respond quickly to changing light conditions, darken in bright light and lighten in dim light. NXT polyurethane lens material provides exceptional optical clarity and visual comfort. Extremely flexible and impact-resistant, NXT are guaranteed not to scratch, break or crack. NXT lenses feature a long lasting antifog coating that stops condensation from forming on lens surfaces. Lightweight nylon frame wraps close around the face for excellent peripheral protection. Supple, shockproof nose pads become tacky as you perspire holding eyewear in place during strenuous activity. Features sculpted temple pads that become tacky as you perspire, holding eyewear in place (without sticking to hair) during strenuous activity. Includes a protective case.
short_description: Keep a sharp eye on the line, whether it's over deep ruts, stones, roots, or ravines with the adaptable Julbo Dirt photochromic sunglasses that can be worn in a wide variety of light conditions.
